You started begging again for Kate to let you go, but she stuck a small apple in your mouth to shut you up. Kate opened the oven which she had been preheating to 350 degrees. She slid you in smiling, "In you go tasty Tina turkey. I'll be back to re-baste your plump and juicy goodness." After a half hour you began to smell yourself cooking and you had to admit you were making yourself hungry. You knew it was the end, your goose is literally being cooked. After the first hour, Kate took you out to re-baste you. You saw that she just had a smile on her face like it was an normal occurrence to be roasting a relative like a turkey. By the second re-basting you had passed out and died.
         Four hours after you had entered for the first time, you had endured three re-basting. Kate finally took you out, you were now a steaming golden brown roasted girl, placed on a silver platter on your back in the turkey position. She placed a dome covering over you to hide you so that she could surprise Melissa with the special birthday dinner, of course Gina would be surprise too. Kate called the girls into the dinning room. Melissa jumped up and down, "Where's Tina, I don't want her to miss my birthday dinner." Kate smiled and lifted the dome off, "Don't worry she isn't going to miss it, because she is the dinner." The girls' jaws dropped. The girls started to cry and both said, "Why did you shrink Tina and cook her, she was our favorite cousin." It was true that Kate had been the one that shrunk Tina, she had a shrinking power and decided it was time to stop Tina flaunting her body like it was a hot piece of meat, now she was meat.
         Kate carved Tina up and gave the girls each a plate with breast, rump, and thigh meat on it with a glob of stuffing, "You girls eat that or you will be in the oven just like Tina was." The girls stopped crying and gobbled down the Tina meat and then began thanking their mother saying that Tina was the best meat they had ever eaten. Melissa spoke, "Thanks Mom for the roasting Tina, she is scrumptious, now I wonder why we didn't eat her sooner. I can find a new friend to play with." You were devoured quickly. You were plump and juicy and the next day you made great leftover you sandwiches.
141111.title: You Are Birthday Dinner.

14112.content:
"Aunt Kate!" you cry out. She doesn't seem to hear you. You notice a broom propped up against the counter. You go to it, and try desperately to knock it over. You can't quite manage it, but you do manage to make in knock against the counter. That gets Kate's attention, as she turns around. You jump up and down, desperately trying to get her to notice you. She looks down, and her eyes grow wide as she realized what she's seeing.

"Tina? Is that you?" she asked.

"Yes, Aunt Kate!" you cry, "Something happened to me! I just was in the hallway and suddenly I was tiny!"

Kate grins as she scoops you up into her hand. "Aww, look at you, Tina. You look so cute!" she coos as she carries you over to the counter. She sets you down, and you get a look at what she's been making: cupcakes. There is a tin of half full cups sitting next to a giant bowl of chocolate batter. Kate leans over on the counter to inspect you closer. She pokes you in the stomach, and giggles as you fall over on your bottom.

"Look at my teeny-weeny Tina!" Kate said in a baby voice. She knocks you back over as you struggle to stand. You scowl at her, and she smirks, and stands back up again. She went back to her cupcakes, finishing filling the little cups with the thick, chocolatey goo. You noticed that she keeps looking over at you out of the corner of your eye, which makes you very nervous. You would hate to end up inside one of those cupcakes...

You feel very relieved when Kate sticks the pan into the oven and shuts the door. She then turns to you.

"You know, Tina, I didn't think that that shrinking potion would work..." she muses.

"You mean YOU did this to me?" You shriek.

"I thought for sure that that old lady was bluffing. But I guess she was right. It took a few hours, but here you are, three inches tall, and cute as a button! Just bite sized!" She then gets an odd look on her face, and before you can even think about trying to escape, she grabs you and raises you to her face.

"Aunt Kate, what are you doing?" you ask nervously.

"You know, Tina, I could use a little snack...


choose...
14112.title: Choice.2

1413.content:
Many things could happen, so here are more choices. Since this is the kitchen, you better hope one of your cousins or your Aunt isn't hungry enough to think you would be a tasty snack or meal. You don't want to swim in a belly.

Choose.....
1413.title: More Choices.

info.brief_description: Choose the role of Jason or Tina in their separate shrink stories. Paths aren't labeled.
info.description:
This interactive will be like a survival game. There will be mystery choices, so you won't know what will happen if you click on a choice. You will take on the roll of either Jason or Tina.

Rules:
1.)In the Jason branch, there are to be no other guys besides him, so no gay stuff, just girls and women. In the Tina branch, there can be girls and women, but only one guy at a time, if you want another guy to enter the scene, the first guy must have left before the second guy enters.
2.)No animals, insects, bugs, reptiles, furries, etc. etc. Only human people. Also no cartoon, video game or television characters; characters are to be original from your mind.
3.)Age limit for female characters is 15 to 35. Age limit for male characters is 15 to 25.
4.)The characters will start out shrunk to three inches, but they can change size, the size limits are 1 inch to 20 inches. It can be unknown why they change size, or it can be the work of one of the normal sized characters.
5.)The ways that Jason and Tina can die is by being, swallowed and digested, chewed, cooked, sat on, or being used to roughly when being used for sexual pleasure. No being stepped on, it is overdone.
6.)Editions are to be written in the second person perspective as in: You climbed up her jeans.
7.)I will be lenient and allow editions to be a minimum of 4 good sentences instead of the usual 6. Just remember though, the more in depth an edition is, the more enjoyable it will be to the reader.
8.)Perfect spelling and grammar is a must. So no messenger like typing. Use a word processor spell checker like Microsoft Word, before you add.
9.)If you make an edition don't put any description in the choice blanks, just put choice 1, choice 2, etc, etc. It is suppose to be like a game. You make the wrong choice you lose.
